ShanghaiDoll.NAME: Shanghai Doll
DESCRIPTION: When generated, deal %s damage to a random enemy. Can be affected by #yStrength.
Deal %s damage to the enemy with the lowest HP.

NetherlandsDoll.NAME: Netherlands Doll
DESCRIPTION: In this turn, provide %s #yStrength and #yDexterity for Alice.

HouraiDoll.NAME: Hourai Doll
DESCRIPTION: Other dolls gain %s to their effects. Not affected by #yHourai #yDolls .
Other dolls gain %s to their effects (currently #b%d). Not affected by #yHourai #yDolls .
Until your next turn, gain %s to passive effects.

KyotoDoll.NAME: Kyoto Doll
DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Alice and all #yDolls retain up to %s #yBlock .
At the start of your turn, Alice and all #yDolls retain up to %s #yBlock (currently #b%d).
At the start of your turn, all #yDolls gain %s #yBlock .
Alice gains #yBlock equal to the #yBlock of this.

LondonDoll.NAME: London Doll
DESCRIPTION: When destroyed or #yRecycled , generate a random non-London #yDoll in the leftmost empty slot.

FranceDoll.NAME: France Doll
DESCRIPTION: Can absorb all non-attack damage from all sources. Will not lose #yBlock at the start of your turn.

次后自动 回收 。 NL 被 回收 时，为爱丽丝恢复
选择一张手牌 升级 。
